sentences.sContent: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentences.sContent_eng: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentences.sCn: 英语、荷兰语、德语是同语族的语言。

sentences.sContent: As a friend of the Dutch people, we feel truly happy for you and admire your achievements.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a friend of the Dutch people, we feel truly happy for you and admire your achievements.
sentences.sCn: 作为荷兰人民的朋友，我们对你们取得的成就感到由衷的钦佩和高兴。

phrases.pCn: 荷兰式拍卖；喊价逐步减低的拍卖
各付己帐；各自付帐的聚餐或娱乐活动
无法理解的语言；莫名其妙的话

trans.tranOther: relating to the Netherlands, its people, or its language
